Plot: A woman struggles to interact with her family and find her place in society after spending fifteen years in prison.
Title: I've Loved You So Long
Actors: Kristin Scott Thomas, Elsa Zylberstein, Serge Hazanavicius, Laurent Grévill
tomatoConsensus: I've Loved You So Long is a sublimely acted family drama as well as a noteworthy directorial debut from Phillipe Claudel.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Golden Globes. Another 14 wins & 27 nominations.
